about_the_game:
Horny Sekai is a visual novel where you need to draw magic symbols to defeat monsters.

Find your place in this new world. Make money by playing the minigame. Fight with monsters and examine all of them!
Meet hot girls who live in this world. Enjoy smooth and realistic CG animation and feel the deep characters of the heroines. Give gifts and spend time with them to build relationships.
Discover their secrets in the Horny Sekai!

Game story:


Forest, unfamiliar girl, and... white truck? What happened, and how did I get here?
Now, it's just me and this unknown isekai world. I have no choice but to go around the world and get closer with the girls of all races of the world.



Gameplay features:


  • 4 Beautiful girls with animated CG
  • Interesting story of relationships
  • Symbols-drawing game to defeat monsters to save girls
  • Gallery of opened images

content_descriptors.notes:
All characters are over the age of 18.

This game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 18.04
  • Processor: 1.7 Ghz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics
  • Storage: 600 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.14
  • Processor: 1.7 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics
  • Storage: 600 MB available space

name: Horny Sekai

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10
  • Processor: 2 Ghz Dual Core
  • Memory: 500 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card supporting DirectX 9.0c
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any

short_description: Horny Sekai is a visual novel where you need to draw magic symbols to defeat monsters. Meet hot girls who live in this world. Enjoy smooth and realistic CG animation and feel the deep characters of the heroines. Give gifts and spend time with them to build relationships.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Bulgarian, Czech, Danish, Dutch, Finnish, Greek, Hungarian, Japanese, Korean, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese - Portugal, Romanian, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Swedish, Thai, Traditional Chinese, Turkish, Ukrainian, Vietnamese, Portuguese - Brazil
